sqlMap.select: SELECT diplome_$$c as id, decode(diplome_$$c,'ING', diplome || ' ancien règlement',diplome) as libelle, decode(diplome_$$c,'ING2',1,'MST',2,'ING',3,'TC',4,5) as ordre FROM gerry.diplome d WHERE (select pp.an_univ||pp.prd_univ as prd from gerry.param_prd pp,gerry.diplome p where p.diplome_$$c = d.diplome_$$c and par_prd_type=decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 'DEF','U', 'DEF3C')) between nvl(d.deb_an_univ||d.deb_prd_univ,'19001A') and nvl(d.ferm_an_univ||d.ferm_prd_univ,'99992P') order by ordre

SELECT diplome_$$c as id, decode(diplome_$$c,'ING', diplome || ' ancien règlement',diplome) as libelle, decode(diplome_$$c,'ING2',1,'MST',2,'ING',3,'TC',4,5) as ordre FROM gerry.diplome d WHERE (select pp.an_univ||pp.prd_univ as prd from gerry.param_prd pp,gerry.diplome p where p.diplome_$$c = d.diplome_$$c and par_prd_type=decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 'DEF','U', 'DEF3C')) between nvl(d.deb_an_univ||d.deb_prd_univ,'19001A') and nvl(d.ferm_an_univ||d.ferm_prd_univ,'99992P')
#periode:VARCHAR# between nvl(d.deb_an_univ||d.deb_prd_univ,'19001A') and nvl(d.ferm_an_univ||d.ferm_prd_univ,'99992P')
order by ordre

SELECT rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ as id, rp.libelle, 1 as ordre FROM gerry.ref_periode rp, gerry.diplome d, gerry.param_prd pp WHERE rp.PRD_TYPE_$$C = d.PRD_TYPE_$$C and pp.par_prd_type = decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 'DEF','U', 'DEF3C') and rp.AN_UNIV || rp.PRD_UNIV between nvl(d.DEB_AN_UNIV||d.DEB_PRD_UNIV,'19001A') and nvl(d.FERM_AN_UNIV||d.FERM_PRD_UNIV,'99992P') and rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ<=pp.AN_UNIV||pp.prd_univ and rp.prd_type_$$c = d.prd_type_$$c and d.diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR# order by rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ DESC

SELECT distinct rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ as id, rp.libelle, decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 1,'U', 2) as ordre FROM gerry.ref_periode rp, gerry.diplome d, gerry.param_prd pp WHERE rp.PRD_TYPE_$$C = d.PRD_TYPE_$$C and pp.par_prd_type = decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 'DEF','U', 'DEF3C') and rp.AN_UNIV || rp.PRD_UNIV between nvl(d.DEB_AN_UNIV||d.DEB_PRD_UNIV,'19001A') and nvl(d.FERM_AN_UNIV||d.FERM_PRD_UNIV,'99992P') and rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ < =pp.AN_UNIV||pp.prd_univ and rp.prd_type_$$c = d.prd_type_$$c
d.diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR#
order by ordre

SELECT distinct rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ as id, rp.libelle, decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 1,'U', 2) as ordre FROM gerry.ref_periode rp, gerry.diplome d, gerry.param_prd pp WHERE rp.PRD_TYPE_$$C = d.PRD_TYPE_$$C and pp.par_prd_type = decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 'DEF','U', 'DEF3C') and rp.AN_UNIV || rp.PRD_UNIV between nvl(d.DEB_AN_UNIV||d.DEB_PRD_UNIV,'19001A') and nvl(d.FERM_AN_UNIV||d.FERM_PRD_UNIV,'99992P') and rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ < =pp.AN_UNIV||pp.prd_univ and rp.prd_type_$$c = d.prd_type_$$c
order by ordre

SELECT rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ as id FROM gerry.ref_periode rp, gerry.diplome d, gerry.param_prd pp WHERE rp.PRD_TYPE_$$C = d.PRD_TYPE_$$C and pp.par_prd_type = decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 'DEF','U', 'DEF3C') and rp.AN_UNIV || rp.PRD_UNIV between nvl(d.DEB_AN_UNIV||d.DEB_PRD_UNIV,'19001A') and nvl(d.FERM_AN_UNIV||d.FERM_PRD_UNIV,'99992P') and rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ<=pp.AN_UNIV||pp.prd_univ and rp.prd_type_$$c = d.prd_type_$$c and d.diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR# order by rp.an_univ||rp.prd_univ DESC

SELECT distinct vds.dipl_spec_$$c||eia.niveau_adm as id, vds.dipl_spec_abr|| eia.niveau_adm as libelle, vds.dipl_spec_abr|| eia.niveau_adm as ordre FROM gerry.etu_inscr_adm eia, gerry.vue_dipl_spec vds WHERE vds.diplome_$$c = eia.diplome_$$c and vds.dipl_spec_$$c = eia.dipl_spec_$$c and eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ between nvl(vds.deb_prd,'19001A') and nvl(vds.stop_prd,'99992P') and eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ = #periode:VARCHAR# and eia.diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR# order by ordre

SELECT distinct vds.dipl_spec_$$c||eia.niveau_adm as id, vds.dipl_spec_abr|| eia.niveau_adm as libelle, vds.dipl_spec_abr|| eia.niveau_adm as ordre FROM gerry.etu_inscr_adm eia, gerry.vue_dipl_spec vds WHERE vds.diplome_$$c = eia.diplome_$$c and vds.dipl_spec_$$c = eia.dipl_spec_$$c and eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ between nvl(vds.deb_prd,'19001A') and nvl(vds.stop_prd,'99992P')
eia.an_univ||eia.prd_univ = #periode:VARCHAR#
eia.diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR#
order by ordre

SELECT distinct vds.dipl_spec_$$c as id, vds.dipl_spec_abr as libelle, vds.dipl_spec_abr as ordre FROM gerry.vue_dipl_spec vds,gerry.diplome d WHERE vds.diplome_$$c = d.diplome_$$c and vds.diplome_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR# and (select pp.an_univ||pp.prd_univ as prd from gerry.param_prd pp,gerry.diplome p where p.diplome_$$c = vds.diplome_$$c and par_prd_type=decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 'DEF','U', 'DEF3C') ) between nvl(vds.deb_prd,'19001A') and nvl(vds.stop_prd,'99992P') order by ordre

select rc.categ_id as id, rc.categ_lib as libelle, categ_ordre as ordre from ref_categorie rc, gerry.diplome d where rc.diplome_$$c = d.diplome_$$c and rc.diplome_$$c=#diplome:VARCHAR# and CATEG_ABR<>'NA' and (select pp.an_univ||pp.prd_univ as prd from gerry.param_prd pp,gerry.diplome p where p.diplome_$$c = d.diplome_$$c and par_prd_type=decode(d.prd_type_$$c,'S', 'DEF','U', 'DEF3C') ) between nvl(rc.deb_an_univ||rc.deb_prd_univ,'19001A') and nvl(rc.fin_an_univ||rc.fin_prd_univ,'99992P') order by ordre
SELECT deci_$$c as id, decision as libelle, 1 as ordre FROM ref_decision WHERE DIPLOME_$$c = #diplome:VARCHAR# and deci_$$c in('RE','DR') order by ordre
select distinct uv_$$c as id, uv_$$c as libelle, uv_$$c as ordre from uv where fictive_$$f='N' order by ordre
SELECT DISTINCT CODE FROM GERRY.ref_decision WHERE actif_$$f='O' AND affiche_edition_$$f='O' AND DIPLOME_$$c='ING2' ORDER BY code
SELECT DISTINCT CODE FROM GERRY.ref_decision WHERE actif_$$f='O' AND affiche_edition_$$f='O' AND DIPLOME_$$c='MST' ORDER BY code
SELECT DISTINCT CODE FROM GERRY.ref_decision WHERE actif_$$f='O' AND affiche_edition_$$f='O' AND diplome_$$c NOT IN ('MST','ING2','ING') ORDER BY code
